trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBREL300GETGLASSAGAIN_00351_ARNOTT_000_000<tab>You require another anima glass? Surely you jest, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I can see it right there in your hand.
TEXT_JOBREL300GETGLASSAGAIN_00351_ARNOTT_000_001<tab>I would gladly furnish you with another, but only if you are truly in need.
TEXT_JOBREL300GETGLASSAGAIN_00351_ARNOTT_000_010<tab>You misplaced the anima glass, you say?
TEXT_JOBREL300GETGLASSAGAIN_00351_ARNOTT_000_011<tab>That will not do at all. Thankfully, I have prepared several more at Lady Ulan's behest for just such an occasion.
TEXT_JOBREL300GETGLASSAGAIN_00351_ARNOTT_000_020<tab>Please do take care not to lose this one. I would rather not waste valuable time for research on fashioning more glass.
TEXT_JOBREL300GETGLASSAGAIN_00351_ARNOTT_000_030<tab>If you are certain you no longer require the glass, I will not question your decision.

TEXT_JOBREL300GETGLASSAGAIN_00351_ARNOTT_000_031<tab>Should you change your mind, however, you are always welcome to take one. As Lady Ulan is wont to misplace our supplies, I make a point to always keep a surplus on hand.
